mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mossy Creek Academy: This institution is located on Mossy Creek, in the northern part of Augusta County, Virginia. The second half of the session of 1853 and '54, commences on the sixth of February, 1854
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hotchkiss, Jedediah, 1828-1899
Mossy Creek Academy (Augusta County, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Jed Hotchkiss, Principal and Professor of Natural Sciences.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tipped into a folded sheet with two handwritten pages titled "Lecture on the honey bee. Mossy Creek Academy, Ap. 3rd 1857 Jed. Hotchkiss.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Coles Fund. Transferred from MSS. Division.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Private schools--Virginia.
Education--Virginia--Augusta County.
